title: M. L. Logan
text: M. L. Logan was a <a href="Great%20Britain">British</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. He competed at the <a href="1900%20Summer%20Olympics">1900 Summer Olympics</a> and won <a href="olympic%20medal">silver</a> as part of the Great Britain team in what was the <a href="Rugby%20union%20at%20the%201900%20Summer%20Olympics">first rugby union competition</a> at an <a href="Olympic%20Games">Olympic Games</a>.
